/*eslint-disable */ import React, { Component } from "react" import { Button, Form, Header, Segment } from "semantic-ui-react" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { registerUser } from "../actions" import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom" class NewUserForm extends Component { state = { username: "", name: "", password: "", location: "", bio: "", img_url: "", facebook_url: "", twitter_url: "", soundcloud_url: "" } handleCreateNewUser = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.registerUser(this.state, this.props.history) } handleNewUserChange = e => { const targetValue = e.target.value const targetName = e.target.name this.setState({ [targetName]: targetValue }) } render() { // console.log(this.state) const newUserStyle = { margin: "5% 20%" } return (
Create Your Profile!

 {/* TODO Add Socials & Images */}
) } } export default connect( null, { registerUser } )(withRouter(NewUserForm))
